channel.title: Issues with RSCD v25 Source
channel.description: Guys i am having an issue with it. Everytime i try to run the server or the complier and such it says "ant" is not a reconisable command or something like that. How can i fix this becasue i really want to start codeing my server.

item.title: Issues with RSCD v25 Source
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

ONce you haev downloaded and extracted apache -ant

do these steps:

  1. Right click computer > properties
  2. Goto advanced tab or if your in vista click “advanced system settings”
  3. Click Environmental Variablitities
  4. Now for User vairables make a new one called “PATH”
  5. Value is your apachies bin folder. MIne is “C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin”
  6. Ok > OK and run now, it should work.

Anymore questions, fell free to post here.

Read full topic
